# plugin

Operations for managing tools and plugins.

[üìÑÔ∏è addThe proto plugin add command will add the provided ID and plugin locator string to](/docs/proto/commands/plugin/add)

[üìÑÔ∏è infoThe proto plugin info command will display information about a tool and its plugin.](/docs/proto/commands/plugin/info)

[üìÑÔ∏è listThe proto plugin list [...id] command will list all available and configured plugins, for both](/docs/proto/commands/plugin/list)

[üìÑÔ∏è removeThe proto plugin remove command will remove the provided tool ID from the [plugins] section](/docs/proto/commands/plugin/remove)

[üìÑÔ∏è searchThe proto plugin search command will search for plugins provided by the community, based](/docs/proto/commands/plugin/search)

[pin](/docs/proto/commands/pin)

[add](/docs/proto/commands/plugin/add)
